text: Shito yo, anata gata no shuchū ni aru horyo-tachi ni itte yaru ga ī. `Moshi arrā ga, anata gata no kokoronouchi ni nanika yoimono ga aru koto o mitome rarereba, anata gataga bosshū sa reta mono yori mo sugureta mono o atae, mata anata gata o yurusa reru. Arrā wa kan'yō ni shite jihibukaku ara reru
